title: Democratic Party of Connecticut
deleted: In Connecticut, there are Democratic Town Committees in many of the towns and cities. They consist of an elected Chairperson, Co-Chairperson, Secretary and Treasurer.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ctdems.org/content/go-local |title=Local Committees | Democratic Party of Connecticut |publisher=Ctdems.org |accessdate=2012-08-06 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120725141832/http://www.ctdems.org/content/go-local |archivedate=2012-07-25 }}</ref> The Town Committees have the ability to endorse a particular candidate in a primary election.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.cga.ct.gov/2011/pub/chap153.htm#Sec9-382.htm |title=CHAPTER 153* NOMINATIONS AND POLITICAL PARTIES |publisher=Cga.ct.gov |accessdate=2012-08-06 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20121013051039/http://www.cga.ct.gov/2011/pub/chap153.htm#Sec9-382.htm |archive-date=2012-10-13 |url-status=dead }}</ref>
